src:
Jadwal Liga 1 Indonesia Lengkap Pekan Ini
03 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Liga 1 Indonesia sudah memasuki pekan ke-27. Persaingan tim-tim di papan atas dan bawah semakin sengit. Sejauh ini puncak klasemen masih dipegang oleh Bali United yang mengoleksi 55 poin.
Bali United seolah berlari sendirian dalam perebutan gelar juara Liga 1 musim ini. Sebab jarak pasukan Stefano Cugurra ini dengan empat tim di posisi lima besar cukup jauh. Mereka berjarak 11 poin dari Madura United yang menempati posisi kedua. Bila tampil konsisten tidak menutup kemungkinan gelar juara liga sudah bisa dipastikan sebelum kompetisi berakhir.
Memasuki pekan ini, Bali United akan bertandang ke markas PSS Sleman di Stadion Maguwoharjo. Kedua kesebelasan dijadwalkan bertanding pada Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Laga besar pekan ini akan tersaji antara Arema FC melawan Madura United. Di laga nanti, penting bagi Arema untuk meraih poin sebab persaingan di papan atas klasemen amat ketat. Jarak antartim di lima besar tidak lebih dari tiga poin. Arema punya peluang menembus empat besar bila sanggup mengamankan tiga poin.

Berikut Jadwal Liga 1 Indonesia Pekan ke-27

Senin, 4 November 2019Persela Lamongan vs Barito Putera, Gelora Surajaya, Pukul 18:30 WIB (O Channel)
Selasa, 5 November 2019Borneo FC vs Badak Lampung FC, Stadion Segiri Samarinda, Pukul 18:30 WIB (O Channel)
Rabu, 6 November 2019PSM Makassar vs Kalteng Putra, Stadion Gelora Andi Mattalatta, Pukul 15:30 WIB (O Channel)PSS Sleman vs Bali United, Stadion Maguwoharjo, Pukul 15:30 WIB (Indosiar) Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang, Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Pukul 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Kamis, 7 November 2019Persipura Jayapura vs Bhayangkara FC, Stadion Gelora Delta Pukul 15:30 WIB Semen Padang FC vs Persija Jakarta, Stadion H. Agus Salim Pukul 16:00 WIB (Indosiar)
Jumat, 8 November 2019Arema FC vs Madura United, Stadion Kanjuruhan Pukul 15:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Tunda, Pindah ke Pekan 28Tira Persikabo vs Persebaya Pakansari

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
Indonesian League 1 Schedule Complete This Week
03 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League 1 of Indonesia has entered its 27th week. The competition between the top and bottom teams is increasingly fierce. So far the top of the standings are still held by Bali United who collected 55 points.
Bali United as if running alone in the race for the League 1 title this season. Because the distance of Stefano Cugurra's troops with four teams in the top five is quite far. They are 11 points from Madura United who finished second. If you appear consistent it does not rule out the possibility of a league title can be ascertained before the competition ends.
Entering this week, Bali United will visit the PSS Sleman headquarters at Maguwoharjo Stadium. Both teams are scheduled to compete on Wednesday 6 November 2019.
This week's big match will be presented between Arema FC and Madura United. In the match later, it is important for Arema to win points because competition at the top of the table is very tight. The distance between teams in the top five is no more than three points. Arema has the opportunity to penetrate the top four if able to secure three points.

Following is the Indonesian League 1 Schedule Week 27

Monday, 4 November 2019Perela Lamongan vs Barito Putera, Gelora Surajaya, At 18:30 WIB (O Channel)
Tuesday, 5 November 2019 Bristol FC vs Badak Lampung FC, Samarinda Segiri Stadium, At 18:30 WIB (O Channel)
Wednesday, November 6, 2019 PSM Makassar vs. Kalteng Putra, Gelora Andi Mattalatta Stadium, 15:30 WIB (O Channel) PSS Sleman vs Bali United, Maguwoharjo Stadium, 15:30 WIB (Indosiar) Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang, Si Jalak Stadium Harupat, 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Thursday, 7 November 2019Pipipura Jayapura vs Bhayangkara FC, Delta Gelora Stadium At 15:30 WIB Semen Padang FC vs Persija Jakarta, H. Agus Salim Stadium At 16:00 WIB (Indosiar)
Friday 8 November 2019 Arema FC vs Madura United, Kanjuruhan Stadium at 15:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Delay, Move to Week 28Tira Persikabo vs Persebaya Pakansari

INDONESIA LIGA
